title: Activision CEO Bobby Kotick Steps Down From Coca-Cola Board; Kotick had served as a director for the drinks company since 2012
text:
Mr. Kotick, who has been a director since 2012, said he was stepping down to provide full attention to the company's pending tie-up with Microsoft Corp.

This is a developing story and will be updated.

Activision CEO Bobby Kotick Steps Down From Coca-Cola Board
